this_title: The Real Housewives of Orange County Season 18
trans_title: 橘子郡娇妻 第十八季
introduction: After a difficult year, Shannon is doing her best to move forward as she faces the consequences from her DUI. Emily deals with a new gym obsession. Tamra finds herself down dos amigas. Relationships are put to the test as both Gina and Jenn explore new living arrangements with their partners. Heather’s “New Year, New Me” party brings tensions to a head when Alexis joins the ladies and revels in her new relationship with Shannon’s ex-boyfriend, John Janssen.
chinese_title: 橘子郡娇妻 第十八季
foreign_title: The Real Housewives of Orange County Season 18
